bwwExcerpt: Well, does it kill? The answer is definitely yes, no and sometimes. In other words, success depends on what's happening in "American Psycho," the alternately dazzling and dull musical...in the middle is Benjamin Walker ("Bloody Bloody Andrew Jackson"), so weird and nuanced as Patrick that misgivings...
